alert.note: Alert for Cass; Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:27PM CDT until May 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cass County in west central Illinois... Southeastern Schuyler County in west central Illinois... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 727 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Sterling, or 9 miles southwest of Rushville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Beardstown and Browning. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
